name: Chirag
p1_desc: Elon musk ko follow krte hue har dusre din naya startup karta hai....business krega ye ladka. College mai har cheez mai fasa hai...college k swd dean of chief warden bhi inke karname jante hai
p2_desc: Kafi bakchod hai.. pehle apne batch ki bandiyon par line mari or jab unhone bhaav nhi dia toh junior par shuru kr dia
shortText2: Bandi patane k liye CT liya aur phir senior ko patane k liye uske portrait banaye.
